title: Nadia Bartel takes selfies at a Mercedes-Benz event in Melbourne
text:
She's the social media superstar with more than 620,000 followers on Instagram.

And on Thursday, Nadia Bartel made sure to document her every move online when she attended a Mercedes-Benz event in Melbourne.

The 34-year-old was spotted taking selfies at the event, which she later posted to Instagram.

Picture perfect: Nadia Bartel took selfies at a Mercedes-Benz event in Melbourne on Thursday

She later struck a few animated poses while her sister Michelle Coppolino snapped some photos with an iPhone.

Nadia looked stylish in blue denim jeans, black ankle boots and a beige coat.

Adding some designer flair to her ensemble, she accessorised with a Louis Vuitton handbag.

All aboard! The stylish WAG clamored into a large truck as part of the event

Sisters: Nadia later struck a few animated poses while her sister Michelle Coppolino snapped some photos with an iPhone

Earlier that day, Nadia celebrated her youngest son Henley's first birthday.

She shared a gallery of photos and videos to Instagram of Henley from the past 12 months, alongside a sweet tribute.

'Happy 1st birthday to my smiley, happy and cheeky little boy who loves to bounce to a beat even more than his mumma!' Nadia began.

Poser! The glamorous socialite perched herself on the front of the truck and posed

'You make Aston [her eldest son] and I laugh every single day. Love you H.'

Nadia also shared her 'favourite' video of Henley, which showed him opening his eyes for the first time when he was just 'a few days old'.

Nadia recently split with her AFL star husband Jimmy Bartel, who is now believed to be seeing socialite Lauren Mand.
description: She's the social media superstar with more than 620,000 followers on Instagram.
